code: import React from'react';import{CartesianGrid,Legend,ResponsiveContainer,Scatter,ScatterChart,Tooltip,XAxis,YAxis,ZAxis}from'recharts';import{data01,data02}from'./data';var ThreeDimScatterChart=function ThreeDimScatterChart(){return React.createElement(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:400},React.createElement(ScatterChart,{margin:{top:10,right:0,left:-25,bottom:0}},React.createElement(XAxis,{dataKey:'x',name:"stature",unit:"cm"}),React.createElement(YAxis,{dataKey:'y',name:"weight",unit:"kg"}),React.createElement(ZAxis,{dataKey:'z',range:[60,400],name:"score",unit:"km"}),React.createElement(CartesianGrid,null),React.createElement(Tooltip,{cursor:{strokeDasharray:'3 3'}}),React.createElement(Legend,null),React.createElement(Scatter,{name:"A school",data:data01,fill:"#3367d6",shape:"star"}),React.createElement(Scatter,{name:"B school",data:data02,fill:"#ffc658",shape:"triangle"})));};export default ThreeDimScatterChart;
